definition[0]: if ice or snow thaws, or if the sun thaws it, it turns into water
definition[1]: to let frozen food become warmer until it is ready to cook
example[1]: Thaw frozen meat in its packet and then cook as soon as possible.
definition[2]: to become friendlier and less formal
example[2]: After a few glasses of wine Robert began to thaw a little.
definition[3]: a period of warm weather during which snow and ice melt
definition[4]: an improvement in relations between two countries, after a period of unfriendliness
